input.sentences: [female] got up early to plan her fourth of july party .
she planned the party and the firework display very carefully .
she bought purple fireworks for her youngest daughter and she loved them .
she bought blue and orange fireworks for her husband and son .
they ended the night with a huge yellow firework and everyone loved the party .
output.sentences: Stacey loves planning the 4th of July party.
This year she has planned to get some fireworks for it.
She saw some purple ones last year that she loved, they reminded her of flowers in the sky.
Her husband and son remembered only the big orange fireworks.
They ended up getting some yellow sparks they lit the night of the party.
